greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0)=1, a(1)=0; a(2^i + j) = a(j) + a(j+1) for 0 <= j < 2^i.
link: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8191

David Applegate, Omar E. Pol and N. J. A. Sloane, The Toothpick Sequence and Other Sequences from Cellular Automata, Congressus Numerantium, Vol. 206 (2010), 157-191. [There is a typo in Theorem 6: (13) should read u(n) = 4.3^(wt(n-1)-1) for n >= 2.]
N. J. A. Sloane, Catalog of Toothpick and Cellular Automata Sequences in the OEIS
maple: for n from 2 to 120 do i:=floor(log(n)/log(2));
mathematica: a = {1, 0}; Do[AppendTo[a, a[[j]] + a[[j + 1]]], {i, 6}, {j, 2^i}]; a (* _Ivan Neretin_, Jun 28 2017 *)
xref: If first two terms are dropped, same as A151552.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 06 2009
